item.description:
Here's our chance... A trip has been approved for 10 of us for a private tour of the Logan Tower. How cool is that. .... We can check on a second tour depending on the response..... All names have to be approved by the FAA in advance....

I'll check on the landing fee's for those with room left on their credit cards!!!!!.... Otherwise, we may have to drive into Alewife, the T it into Logan....


Don't miss this opportunity!!!

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: BOS Logan Tower Tour
